Package webscraperwikipedia

package webscraperwikipedia
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    Home
    If you run the Home class, a frame will appear on the screen.
    Imperatore
    This class inherts all the methods and attributes from Person class and his used when a Person object is found out to be an Emperor, so an attribute that shows how long his reign lasted is necessary.
    Node
    Node class This class contains a node attributes, all of them get initialized in the constructor method and they are useful when it comes to draw the node thanks to its get methods
    Person
    This class stores the data of each Web Scraped page from Wikipedia
    Secondary
    From the Home class, by performing the first search, you will automatically switch to the Secondary class, which has the function of showing on screen the image of the family tree of the emperor just searched and to continue with the search by updating the image in the center of the window.
    StringProcessor
    This class is used to process the starting root into an indented String that follows a format to store informations that will be used when creating Node objects.
    TreeImage
    This class is the actor that will draw the final image after creating all the istances of Node
